mapper.sql: id, roomtypeid, name, pms, islock, floor, score
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.roomtypeid, a.NAME, a.pms, a.islock, a.floor, a.score, b.isWindow, b.roomTypeName FROM t_room a LEFT JOIN t_room_setting b ON a.roomtypeid = b.roomTypeId AND a.NAME = b.roomNo WHERE a.roomtypeid = #{roomtypeid} ORDER BY a.NAME ASC

select
from t_room where roomtypeid in( select id from t_roomtype where thotelid=#{hotelId})
mapper.insert: insert into t_room (roomtypeid, name, pms, islock) values ( #{roomtypeid}, #{name}, #{pms}, 0 )
mapper.update: update t_room set name=#{name} where id=#{id}
update t_room set roomtypeid = #{roomtypeid} where id = #{roomid}
mapper.select: select id from b_otaroomordder where pmsroomorderno = #{pmsRoomOrderNo} limit 1

from t_room where pms = #{pms} and roomtypeid in(select id from t_roomtype where ehotelid=#{hotelid}) limit 1
